promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi young legendary butterfly psychic-type pokemon with a galaxy-pattern crystal core. It can be found in crypt-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, psychic or butterfly. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Galaxystal, a a chibi young legendary butterfly psychic-type pokemon. It can be found in crypt-like environments It has the following abilities: Dark Flash, Third Eye. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "butterfly", "psychic" or "Galaxystal". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of psychic-type pokemon, butterfly-like, legendary, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, violet shadows
generatedDescription: In shadowy halls, this astral moth-like entity, Galaxystal, thrives, using Dark Flash to navigate. It unfolds its Third Eye to glimpse truths unseen.
